r.s: Provides a wrapper to the ImageMagick library.
r.d:
Imagick is a native php extension to create and modify images using the ImageMagick API. This extension requires ImageMagick version 6.2.4+ and PHP 5.1.3+.
IMPORTANT: Version 2.x API is not compatible with earlier versions.
r.n: + ImagickDraw::setFont and ImagickDraw::setFontFamily now allow only valid fonts + Added IMAGICK_EXTVER and IMAGICK_EXTNUM constants + Added check for empty or invalid pseudo format string in Imagick::newPseudoImage + Fixed incorrect arg hinting for Imagick::compareImageChannels
